attachments.fallback:
[October 28th, 2016 11:39 AM] doug_nicholson: Hey Party People (that means everybody)! This is a reminder about PARTY NUMBER TWO of HOWLAWEEKEND this *Saturday at my place from 9pm - Whenever*. Significant others, roommates and dogs are all welcome! We’ll have a costume contest, pong games, snacks and candy, glow sticks, a spooky fog machine dance floor (with lots of monster mash remixes and halloween flavored trap jamz). There will be a keg for those who don’t want to BYOB. Just throw a couple bucks my way for a cup.

My address is *5435 Silver Moon Lane*. It’s an end unit with orange string lights on the banister. The townhome complex has some visitor parking right near our place (8 spots or so). But there’s more about 100 yards down the street at the intersection of Silver Moon and Retro Rose. Any unmarked spot not directly in front of a house is visitor parking. That being said, I encourage people to carpool or uber! Call me if you have any issues: <tel:804-687-5574|804-687-5574>.

Congrats on Fall 2! I can’t wait to see you all at Sylvie’s and then at my place! You can do it! (Rumor is that Sylvie has a stash of pedialyte if you really need help on the double header parties).
attachments.text:
Hey Party People (that means everybody)! This is a reminder about PARTY NUMBER TWO of HOWLAWEEKEND this *Saturday at my place from 9pm - Whenever*. Significant others, roommates and dogs are all welcome! We’ll have a costume contest, pong games, snacks and candy, glow sticks, a spooky fog machine dance floor (with lots of monster mash remixes and halloween flavored trap jamz). There will be a keg for those who don’t want to BYOB. Just throw a couple bucks my way for a cup.

My address is *5435 Silver Moon Lane*. It’s an end unit with orange string lights on the banister. The townhome complex has some visitor parking right near our place (8 spots or so). But there’s more about 100 yards down the street at the intersection of Silver Moon and Retro Rose. Any unmarked spot not directly in front of a house is visitor parking. That being said, I encourage people to carpool or uber! Call me if you have any issues: <tel:804-687-5574|804-687-5574>.

Congrats on Fall 2! I can’t wait to see you all at Sylvie’s and then at my place! You can do it! (Rumor is that Sylvie has a stash of pedialyte if you really need help on the double header parties).

text: <@U1KS1BFED|doug_nicholson> pinned a message to this channel.

HOWLAWEEKEND PARTY TWO reminder! 5435 Silver Moon Lane. We're getting things started at 9pm. We will have a mini keg of shock top (~60 beers worth). More beers are always appreciated though, especially for games!

Again, parking might be at a premium right near our place. But any spots in the complex that are unmarked are visitor spots. There’s about 10 spots at the intersection of retro rose and silver moon lane another group of spots at the intersection of retro rose and Crescentview. And there are others scattered throughout the neighborhood.
It looks like someone put a ton of silver sodas in my bag that aren't actually mine.  So I'll guess I'll be handing out some extras at the party.
Tommy and I are headed to tasty 8s
